name: Reach it
description:
Oh no! Your food is falling and you have only 5 seconds to reach it! Controls:

Use arrow keys (or WASD) to change position and Space (or ZXCV) to grab.

Features:
  • Food (everyone likes food, right?)
  • Exclusive control system!
  • Really cool and long hand!
  • Tile-based mazes.
  • More food

P. S. You may have troubles with pressing arrow keys and space simultaneously. Use WASD keys or ZXCV instead.
